title: Voyage of Dreams: A Collection of Otherwordly Stories
description: Voyage of Dreams: A Collection of Otherworldly Short Stories Journey though the paranormal, the strange and the Afro-Futuristic. . . A paranormal detective is drawn into a sinister plot. . .An alien world believes Earth is its only salvation. . .A young woman faces the truth about her mysterious spells. . .Join them, and other preternatural humans, as they take you on a voyage of dreams. And look for the full novels Mona Livelong: Paranormal Detective and Colony Ascension, An Erotic Space Opera later this year.
author: Valjeanne Jeffers
